class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/VelocityPanel
class.description: A panel widget allowing simple diff-drive style robot base control.

class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/StartButton
class.description: A Button to call a navigation service.

class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/LabelNavGoal
class.description: A Tool to pub a test navigation goal.

class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/LabelPoseEstimate
class.description: A Tool to pub a test initial pose.

class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/SetWaypoint
class.description: A Tool to set waypoint pose.

class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/RotateDiff
class.description: A Tool to set rotate diff pose.

class.name: rviz_navigation_plugin/MoveToPoint
class.description: A Tool to set move to point.
